Text: Really want Season 4 in 720p. I remember someone was putting it together but it never came out?

that someone was me. i would release it if i had every episode from season 4, but there is 1 missing.  been watching the tv schedule and waiting for over a year for that 1 episode and it hasn't re-aired yet.
Thanks trialNerror! Can't wait for it to hit PB!
